meanings.sent1: The caterpillar was the wiggiest creature in the garden.
meanings.sent2: The snake moved in the wiggiest way possible.
meanings.sent3: The wiggiest dance move at the party made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: Her hair was the wiggiest mess after playing outside.
meanings.sent5: The wiggly jellyfish was the wiggiest thing I've ever seen.

meanings.sent1: The puppy had the wiggiest tail when excited.
meanings.sent2: The noodles were the wiggiest food she had ever tried.
meanings.sent3: The wiggiest jump rope competition was full of energy.
meanings.sent4: The wiggiest tree branches swayed in the wind.
meanings.sent5: The wiggiest dance performance captivated the audience.
